alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Dallas; Grant; Jefferson (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 7:13PM CDT until June 14 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN CLEVELAND...SOUTHEASTERN GRANT...NORTHEASTERN DALLAS AND SOUTHWESTERN JEFFERSON COUNTIES... At 712 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lamont, or 11 miles north of Rison, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Pine Bluff... Rison... White Hall... Lamont... Mt Elba... Toledo... Kedron... Sulphur Springs... Ain... Farindale... Faith... Prague... Watson Chapel... Staves... Center Grove... Grapevine... Mt Zion... Hardin... Millerville... Clear Lake... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
